abstract.text: Creates an action that animates changes to a sprite’s texture.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: An array of textures to use when animating a sprite.
The amount of time that each texture is displayed.
If
, the sprite is resized to match each new texture. If
, the size of the sprite remains at a constant size.
If
When the action completes, the sprite’s texture is restored to the texture it had before the action completed. (If the resize parameter is
, the sprite is resized to match the size of the original texture.)
If
When the action completes, the sprite’s texture remains set to the final texture in the array.
A new action object.
This action can only be executed by an
object. When the action executes, the sprite’s
property animates through the array of textures. The sprite’s

property is changed to the next texture in the array. The action then pauses for the specified time before continuing. The action continues until it has finished animating through all of the textures in the array. The total duration of the action is the number of textures multiplied by the frame interval.
If the
parameter is
and this action is removed from a node before it completes, then node’s normal texture is still restored. This differs from the default behavior of removing an action.
This action is reversible; the resulting action animates through the same textures from last to first.

abstract.text: A false value.
A true value.
Add high-performance 2D content with smooth animations to your app, or create a game with a high-level set of 2D game-based tools.
An object that is run by a node to change its structure or content.
Creates an action that animates changes to a sprite’s texture.
Creates an action that animates changes to a sprite’s texture, possibly resizing the sprite.
Creates an action that animates changes to a sprite’s normal texture.
Creates an action that animates changes to a sprite’s texture.
Creates an animation that animates a sprite’s color and blend factor.
Creates an action that animates a sprite’s blend factor.
Creates an action that adjusts the size of a sprite.
Creates an action that changes the height of a sprite to a new absolute value.
Creates an action that changes the width of a sprite to a new absolute value.
Creates an action that changes the width and height of a sprite to a new absolute value.
Creates an action that changes a sprite’s normal texture.
Creates an action that changes a sprite’s normal texture, possibly resizing the sprite.
Creates an action that changes a sprite’s texture.
Creates an action that changes a sprite’s texture, possibly resizing the sprite.
An image or solid color.
A texture that specifies the normal map for the sprite.
An image, decoded on the GPU, that can be used to render various SpriteKit objects.
A number of seconds.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
